body_html: @ezyang said using shell=True is not such good practice, and I read some similar comments online (since it actually starts a shell process in the background, and doesn't deal well with quoting), so I opted to change it while I was at it

body: @ezyang said using `shell=True` is not such good practice, and I read some similar comments online (since it actually starts a shell process in the background, and doesn't deal well with quoting), so I opted to change it while I was at it
